5.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Welcome, take a seat!

6.text: Oh yes, sorry. Here you go.

21.text: NARRATOR: Life can be full of awkward moments.

23.text: Job interviews can make people really nervous.

25.text: Some people get really flustered around disability.

31.text: And he is about to be joined by another actor.

33.text: Together, they're going to take awkward to the next level.

36.text: But neither this lady or Alex Brooker

38.text: Have any idea what is about to happen.

43.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Sorry, excuse me two seconds.

54.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Probably an office prank. We have a bit of fun around here!

65.text: Oh, hello! Sorry, I didn't see you there!

68.text: ALEX: This isn't for real is it?

74.text: FEMALE INTERVIEWER: This is meeting room B isn't it?

76.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Yeah, yeah, yeah! It is, well done. How did you know?

77.text: FEMALE INTERVIEWER: I'm here to sit in on the interview.

80.text: FEMALE INTERVIEWER: I'm from Head Office. Did you not get the email?

82.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: No I got the email. I just didn't think it would be...

85.text: FEMALE INTERVIEWER: Shall I come in?

87.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Yes! In you come. Lovely, thank you.

88.text: ALEX: Oh no! This is bad...

90.text: I'd say in terms of what not to do... that's pretty high up the list!

94.text: FEMALE INTERVIEWER: Apologies for interrupting like this.

95.text: Don't worry, you won't even know I'm here. I'm just here to observe!

98.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Sorry. How should I refer to you? What sort of... Do I?

106.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: A Fran? Is that an acronym or?

111.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Okay, fantastic! Well, welcome! Take a seat.

115.text: Oh, sorry! Yes. There we go.

117.text: ALEX: [LAUGHS] She's not the FA Cup! You can't just lift her!

122.text: FRAN: A handshake would have been fine...

125.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: No, it's no bother honestly!

128.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: So, should you be invited to join the company

131.text: I think it's important to try and take baby steps.

138.text: Because the job itself can stretch you...

145.text: FRAN: Please, just try and relax. You don't have to apologise for saying everyday words!

149.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: It's just very rude isn't it?

151.text: Sorry, it's the height of rudeness!

153.text: ALEX: Oh no! Make it stop! This is bad...

158.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: So, what we're looking for with this role is someone who can juggle different roles.

165.text: FRAN: What are you apologising for now?

166.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Well, I said juggle! In my head I started thinking of a circus!

175.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: That's a different focus all together isn't it?

176.text: Sorry, I don't even need to apologise. Sorry Fran!

179.text: ALEX: [LAUGHS] Look at her face! She just wants to go! She wants out!

185.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: Of course we do supply a company car.

196.text: MALE INTERVIEW: Is it a Smart car?

198.text: FRAN: Oh, no. It's a Lexus!

200.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: You drive a Lexus?!

202.text: FRAN: Yes, we get our pick at HR.

208.text: MALE INTERVIEWER: I got a Fiesta...

212.text: ALEX: That is one of the most awkward things I've ever seen...
